entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
